posts.title: Retirement: Information regarding the end of support for the "Microsoft Translator [DEPRECATED]" connector
posts.description: The Microsoft Translator connector and its underlying API have been deprecated and will be disabled on Power Platform starting September 15, 2024. To avoid disruptions, transition to the Microsoft Translator V2 connector and Azure Text to Speech connector for the respective actions.

posts.title: Retirement: Open Service Mesh extension for Arc-enabled Kubernetes will be retired on September 30, 2027
posts.description: Plan out your migration for Open Service Mesh (OSM) to Istio.

posts.title: Retirement: Azure Maps Spatial APIs V1 & 2022-08-01 will be retired on September 30th, 2025.
posts.description: Azure Maps support for Azure Maps Spatial APIs V1 & 2022-08-01 will be retired on September 30th 2025

posts.title: Public Preview: Azure Functions .NET 9 support in Linux plans
posts.description: Azure Functions now supports .NET 9 preview 7, using the isolated worker model.

posts.title: Retirement: Deprecation of Virtual Network Injection for Azure Data Explorer
posts.description: The Virtual Network Injection feature for Azure Data Explorer is being deprecated due to its limitations and challenges. Customers are advised to migrate to a private endpoint-based network security architecture by February 1, 2025, to avoid any disruption

posts.title: Public Preview: Introducing Reporting and Microsoft Entra ID Authentication for Microsoft Playwright Testing
posts.description: We are excited to announce the public preview of Reporting and Microsoft Entra ID authentication for Microsoft Playwright Testing.

posts.title: Public Preview: Virtual machines node pools support in AKS
posts.description: You can now have multiple VM SKU in a node pool in AKS.

posts.title: Retirement: Open Service Mesh add-on for AKS will be retired on September 30, 2027
posts.description: Plan out your migration from Open Service Mesh (OSM) to Istio add-on for Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS).

posts.title: Generally Available: Long-term support for version 1.27 and 1.30 in Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS)
posts.description: You can now enable long-term support (LTS) for Kubernetes version 1.30.

posts.title: Retirement: AKS GPU image (preview) will retire on Jan 10, 2025
posts.description: Effective January 10, 2025, Azure Kubernetes Service will no longer support or provide updates to the GPU image.

posts.title: Generally Available: FIPS mutability support in AKS
posts.description: You can now enable or disable FIPS on an existing Linux node pool in AKS.

posts.title: Generally Available: Extended support: PHP 8.1 on App Service
posts.description: PHP 8.1 support is extending on App Service.

posts.title: Retirement: Extended support for Python 3.9 ends October 2025 – upgrade your apps to Python 3.10
posts.description: Support for Python 3.9 ends October 2025 upgrade apps to Python 3.10

posts.title: Retirement: Extended support for PHP 8.2 ends December 31st, 2026 – upgrade apps to PHP 8.3
posts.description: Support for PHP 8.2 ends December 31st, 2026, upgrade apps to PHP 8.3

posts.title: Retirement: Azure Machine Learning data drift detection will retire on September 1st, 2025
posts.description: Start using the Azure Machine Learning model monitoring instead of the Azure Machine Learning data drift detection before September 1st, 2025.

posts.title: Generally Available: Azure Cosmos DB dynamic scaling—per region and per partition autoscale
posts.description: Optimize costs using the new dynamic scaling enhancement to autoscale for nonuniform workloads.

posts.title: Generally Available: Azure confidential VMs with NVIDIA Tensor Core GPUs
posts.description: VMs based on AMD 4th Gen EPYCTM processors with SEV-SNP technology paired with NVIDIA H100 Tensor Core GPUs.

posts.title: Public Preview: New FX series VMs - FXmsv2 and FXmdsv2
posts.description: The FXmsv2 and FXmdsv2 series are newest additions to the FX subfamily of VMs.

posts.title: Retirement: Azure Load Balancer Inbound NAT rule V1 for Azure VMs and Azure VMSS will be retired
posts.description: Migrate to Azure Load Balancer Inbound NAT rule V2 by September 30, 2027.

posts.title: Retirement: Azure Front Door support for TLS 1.0 and TLS 1.1 will end by 1 Dec 2024
posts.description: The TLS versions 1.2 and later offer improved security with features such as perfect forward secrecy and stronger cipher suites.

posts.title: Retirement: Azure CDN Standard from Microsoft (classic) will be retired on 30 September 2027
posts.description: Migrate to Azure Front Door Standard or Premium to avoid service disruptions.

posts.title: Retirement: Azure Application Gateway support for TLS 1.0 and TLS 1.1 will end by 31 August 2025
posts.description: The TLS versions 1.2 and later offer improved security with features such as perfect forward secrecy and stronger cipher suites.

posts.title: Generally Available: gRPC and frontend mTLS now available for Application Gateway for Containers
posts.description: Application Gateway for Containers now supports gRPC and frontend mutual authentication.  With both frontend and backend mutual authentication, end-to-end mutual authentication is now possible.

posts.title: Retirement: Intent Recognition an Azure AI Speech feature will be retired on September 30th, 2025
posts.description: Intent Recognition an Azure AI Speech feature will be retired on September 30th, 2025.

posts.title: Retirement: SQL Data Sync will be retired on September 30th, 2027
posts.description: Important Notice: Support for SQL Data Sync service will be retired on September 30th,2027.

posts.title: Retirement: Network security group flow logs in Azure Network Watcher will be retired
posts.description: Network security group flow logs in Azure Network Watcher will be retired on September 30th, 2027.

posts.title: Retirement: Azure AI Speaker Recognition
posts.description: Azure AI Speaker Recognition will be retired on September 30, 2025.

posts.title: Retirement: Retirement of Classic Alerts for Azure Site Recovery
posts.description: Classic Alerts for Azure Site Recovery is on a retirement journey. Migrate to an improved solution using Azure Monitor by Sept 23 2027.

posts.title: Retirement: Conversation Transcription Multi Channel Diarization
posts.description: Conversation Transcription Service provided speaker diarization with multichannel audio will be retired on March 28th ,2025.

posts.title: Retirement: VpnGw1-5 (Non-AZ SKUs) will be retired on Sep 30, 2026 – gateways will be automatically migrated to AZ SKUs
posts.description: Retirement notice: VPN Gateway Non-Availability Zone SKU (VpnGw 1-5)

posts.title: Retirement: Transition from Helm Repositories to OCI Artifacts for Storing Helm Charts
posts.description: Helm v2 reached end of life status in November 2020. Therefore, Azure Container Registry will end support for Helm v2 and Helm repositories on March 30th, 2025. Please transition to Helm v3 and store your Helm Charts as OCI Artifacts.

posts.title: Retirement: Azure Automanage Best Practices Retirement. Migrate to Azure Policy
posts.description: Azure Product Retirement: Azure Automanage Best Practices on 09/30/2027. Replace with Azure Policy.

posts.title: Generally Available: V5 reservations for Azure Database for PostgreSQL – Flexible Server
posts.description: Save up to 65% on V5 compute resources by using reserved capacity pricing.

posts.title: Generally Available: Smaller Enterprise tier cache instance for Azure Cache for Redis
posts.description: Take advantage of a lower cost option for your Redis workloads.

posts.title: Generally Available: Online migration from Azure Database for PostgreSQL - Single Server to Flexible Server
posts.description: Experience seamless online migration with minimal application downtime.

posts.title: Generally Available: Latest PostgreSQL minor versions supported by Azure Database for PostgreSQL – Flexible Server
posts.description: Azure Database for PostgreSQL – Flexible Server now supports minor versions 16.4, 15.8, 14.13, 13.16, 12.20, and 17 Beta 3.

posts.title: Retirement: Microsoft Purview Data Sharing (in Public Preview) is retiring on September 26th, 2025
posts.description: This post contains information about pre-retirement actions related to the retirement of Microsoft Purview Data Sharing.

posts.title: Generally Available: Access-based enumeration and non-browsable shares for SMB and dual-protocol Azure NetApp Files volumes
posts.description: Access-based enumeration and non-browsable shares for SMB and dual-protocol volumes in Azure NetApp Files is now generally available

posts.title: Generally Available: Azure NetApp Files Reserved Capacity
posts.description: Cost savings and improved financial predictability with Azure NetApp Files Reserved Capacity

posts.title: Retirement: Azure Maps Creator Service APIs V2 & 2023-03-01-preview will be retired on September 30, 2025
posts.description: Azure Maps support for Creator Services APIs V2 & 2023-03-01-preview will be retired on September 30, 2025

posts.title: Generally Available: Force detach zone redundant data disks during zone outage
posts.description: Customers will now be able to detach the ZRS data disks and attach them to another VM, decreasing the RTO.

posts.title: Public Preview: Advanced Container Networking Services: Enhancing security and observability in AKS
posts.description: Microsoft’s Azure container Networking team is announcing availability of FQDN filtering and HA DNS proxy within Advanced Container Networking Services on Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS). These new features provide a robust and secure solution for managing network traffic in containerized environments.

posts.title: Retirement: Azure Remote Rendering will be retired on September 30th, 2025
posts.description: Azure Remote Rendering will be retired on September 30th, 2025. Please plan to stop usage and delete your Remote Rendering account by September 30th, 2025.

posts.title: Retirement: SQL Insights (preview)
posts.description: SQL Insights (preview) will be retired on December 31, 2024.

posts.title: Public Preview: Announcing Azure Monitor Metrics Export in public preview
posts.description: We are excited to announce a new way of exporting platform metrics from Azure Monitor. This powerful addition allows customers to export metrics for their Azure resources on a large scale, with full fidelity and low latency, along with the ability to select particular metrics while configuring exports.

posts.title: Generally Available: Automated Patching retirement and replacement with Azure Update Manager
posts.description: Automated Patching retirement and replacement with Azure Update Manager.

posts.title: Retirement: Support for PowerShell 7.2 on Azure Functions is ending on November 8, 2024
posts.description: Support for PowerShell 7.2 on Azure Functions is ending soon. Your apps that are hosted on Azure Functions will continue to run, but security updates will no longer be available, and we’ll no longer provide customer service for PowerShell 7.2. Learn more about Azure Functions stack version support.

posts.title: Generally Available: Azure Data Box 80 TB is now Generally available at Azure China
posts.description: General Availability of Azure Data Box 80 TB at Azure China

posts.title: Retirement: Azure SQL Edge will be retired on September 30th, 2025
posts.description: Azure SQL Edge will be retired on September 30, 2025. Upon retirement, workloads deployed to existing SQL Edge modules and containers will continue to run as-is; there will be no additional support provided for SQL Edge and no further updates will be published. We encourage you to consider migrating to an alternative solution prior to the retirement date to ensure a smooth transition to a fully supported product.

posts.title: Retirement: Microsoft Genomics Service
posts.description: Microsoft Genomics Service will be retired on January 6, 2025

posts.title: Retirement: Azure Maps Data Registry APIs V 2023-06-01 will be retired on September 30th, 2025.
posts.description: Azure Maps support for Azure Maps Data Registry APIs V 2023-06-01 will be retired on September 30th, 2025

posts.title: Generally Available: Azure Site Recovery update rollup 75 – August 2024
posts.description: This update also provides improvement and bug fixes.

posts.title: Retirement: Azure AI Vision APIs to be retired
posts.description: Azure AI Vision Image Analysis 4.0 Custom Image Classification, Custom Object Detection, Product Recognition and Segment (Background Removal) Preview APIs and Spatial Analysis Edge container to be retired.

posts.title: Retirement: Azure Managed Confidential Consortium Framework (CCF) Service Support Ending on November 22nd, 2024
posts.description: Azure Managed Azure Managed Confidential Consortium Framework Preview support is ending soon. Please migrate any resources to Azure Confidential Ledger.

posts.title: Retirement: Azure PostgreSQL migration extension in Azure Data Studio (ADS)
posts.description: The Azure PostgreSQL migration extension in Azure Data Studio is being retired to focus on more advanced and supported migration services within the Azure Database for PostgreSQL portal and CLI. This change ensures customers have access to up-to-date features for their migration needs.

posts.title: Generally Available: Java on Azure Container Apps
posts.description: Experience a new way to run Java applications on Azure Container Apps.

posts.title: Public Preview: Low-Code RAG ingestion with built-in document parsing and chunking in Logic Apps Standard
posts.description: We are thrilled to introduce the Public Preview of built-in actions for document parsing and chunking in Logic Apps Standard, designed to streamline RAG-based ingestion for Generative AI applications. With these out-of-the-box operations, you can now easily ingest documents or files, including both structured and unstructured data, into AI Search without writing or managing any code!

posts.title: Private Preview: Azure Site Recovery support for Azure Trusted Launch VMs (Linux OS)
posts.description: Azure Site Recovery support for Azure Trusted Launch VMs (Linux OS) is now available for private preview.

posts.title: Public Preview: DNAT on Azure Firewall Private IP address
posts.description: Azure Firewall enhances the Destination Network Address Translation (DNAT) rule configuration to support port translation on its Private IP address.

posts.title: Retirement: Azure AI Document Intelligence GA API v2.1 is retiring on 15 September 2027
posts.description: Azure AI Document Intelligence GA AI v2.1 will be retiring soon. Please migrate to newer API version to continue operation.

posts.title: Public Preview: Azure Web PubSub – MQTT support now available
posts.description: Seamlessly deliver content over low-bandwidth, high latency, or unreliable networks.

posts.title: Public Preview: Live Resize for Azure Premium SSD v2 and Ultra Disks
posts.description: This feature is the ability to increase your Premium SSD v2 and Ultra disk storage capacity without stopping your VM.

posts.title: Generally Available: Azure Functions support for PowerShell 7.4
posts.description: You can now take advantage of PowerShell 7.4 capabilities with your Functions apps.

posts.title: Generally Available: Azure SQL Database Hyperscale elastic pools
posts.description: Azure SQL Database Hyperscale elastic pools are now generally available.

posts.title: Generally Available: Azure IoT Edge now supports new version releases of Ubuntu Server, Debian, and Yocto
posts.description: IoT Edge now supports Ubuntu Server 24.04, Debian 12, and Yocto Scarthgap.

posts.title: Retirement: Azure App Service Environment v1/v2 is retired as of August 31, 2024
posts.description: This article contains important information about required actions and post-retirement activities related to the retirement of Azure App Service Environment v1/v2 on August 31, 2024.

posts.title: Generally Available: Auto-renewal of certificates for on-premises to Azure Site Recovery
posts.description: Auto-renewal of certificates for on-premises to Azure Site Recovery.

posts.title: Public Preview: Expanded GenAI Gateway capabilities in Azure API Management
posts.description: We are excited to announce new enhancements to our GenAI Gateway capabilities, specifically designed for large language model (LLM) use cases. Building on our initial release in May 2024, we are introducing new policies to support a wider range of LLMs via the Azure AI Model Inference API. These new policies offer the same robust functionality as our initial offerings but are now compatible with a broader array of models available in Azure AI Studio.

posts.title: Public Preview: Azure Container Storage enabled by Azure Arc Edge Volumes
posts.description: Learn more about the Public Preview announcement of Azure Container Storage enabled by Azure Arc Edge Volumes.

posts.title: Generally Available: Azure Storage Mover with Bandwidth Management
posts.description: Azure Storage Mover with WAN link bandwidth management schedules is now generally available.

posts.title: Generally Available: VMSS Automatic Instance Repairs – Reimage, Restart Repair Actions
posts.description: We are excited to announce that customers can now choose between Replace, Reimage (New), or Restart (New) as the default repair action performed in response to an "Unhealthy" application signal.

posts.title: Public Preview – Templates Support in Azure Logic Apps Standard
posts.description: We're excited to announce the Public Preview of Templates Support in Azure Logic Apps Standard, providing pre-built workflow solutions to streamline and accelerate integration projects. This new feature allows developers to quickly set up, customize, and deploy workflows, simplifying the process of building and managing applications.

posts.title: Public Preview – Out of box monitoring dashboards for Logic Apps Standard
posts.description: We’re excited to introduce Insights support for Azure Logic Apps Standard, offering curated visualizations to help you monitor your applications and workflows more effectively. With these new dashboards, you gain a comprehensive view of your Logic Apps Standard environments, enabling better oversight of your integration scenarios.

posts.title: Public Preview: Entra ID support for SSH connections in portal
posts.description: Entra ID support for SSH connections is now supported in the portal experience for a quicker, more secure, one click experience.

posts.title: Retirement: Azure API Management STV1 compute platform is retired as of August 31, 2024
posts.description: This article contains important information about required actions and post-retirement activities related to the retirement of Azure API Management stv1 on August 31, 2024.

posts.title: Retirement: Azure Logic Apps Integration Service Environment is retired as of August 31, 2024
posts.description: This article contains important information about required actions and post-retirement activities related to the retirement of Azure Logic Apps Integration Service Environment (ISE) on August 31, 2024.

posts.title: Generally Available: Azure Public IPs are zone redundant by default
posts.description: Azure Public IPs are now zone redundant by default in 12 regions.
